title: McElveen Goes Ballistic; First to Ride All of Bentonville’s MTB Trails in one Day
content:
Earlier this year, Payson McElveen went off, becoming the first rider to cover all 142 miles of Bentonville’s MTB trails in a day. Now he invites all comers to try it (at their own pace), and win a load of free gear in the process. On July 6, he released “Trail Town: Bentonville,” a film […]
